summary:
### Summary of GitHub Activity for scaffold-eth/buidlguidl-v3 in August 2025

- **Feature Improvement**: Merged PR #131 introduced server-side redirection logic for build pages, enhancing user navigation to the new SRE build page.
- **No Issues**: No new issues were created during this month.
- **Overall Activity**: Limited activity with only one merged pull request, focusing on improving the build page functionality.

topPRs.title: Add build page redirection to SRE website
